Event 3: The need to provide chemical hazard information and handling advice quickly in emergencies, including referring to information sources and listing experts.
Event 4: The obligation to issue a written document to the contractor within 30 minutes after an accident and to provide the right information to NRCC.
Event 5: Emphasis on keeping product safety data sheets up-to-date and ensuring that the emergency organization (referred to as nrc) has the latest version.
